snippet: The Berkeley Repertory Theater is set to announce Monday that a group of 40 writers, directors and composers will gather there this summer in an effort to develop 13 new projects for the stage.
abstract: Berkeley Repertory Theater is set to announce that a group of 40 writers, directors and composers will participate in a four-week creative workshop to develop 13 new projects for the stage in summer 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Berkeley Repertory Theater is set to announce Monday that a group of 40 writers, directors and composers will gather there this summer in an effort to develop 13 new projects for the stage.
